data.name: I Am Gangster
data.detailed_description:
Manage up to 147 gangsters (126 gangsters in combat at one time), each with different statistics. Use your custom deck to take the City, defeat the enemy gang to claim victory over the city. Use cars/motorbikes and scooters to complete missions against the enemy gang. Everything gangster related will be in this game!

After release I have plans to release some free updates...

-----World Events
-----More awesome cards
-----A gangster weapon experience system(the more they use a certain weapon.. the more damage they will do
-----Different types of transformations(Black wings, Gold wings)
----- Constant quality of life improvements and balancing the game
----- Improve card graphics
----- New mission to plant an enemy RAT
data.about_the_game:
Manage up to 147 gangsters (126 gangsters in combat at one time), each with different statistics. Use your custom deck to take the City, defeat the enemy gang to claim victory over the city. Use cars/motorbikes and scooters to complete missions against the enemy gang. Everything gangster related will be in this game!

After release I have plans to release some free updates...

-----World Events
-----More awesome cards
-----A gangster weapon experience system(the more they use a certain weapon.. the more damage they will do
-----Different types of transformations(Black wings, Gold wings)
----- Constant quality of life improvements and balancing the game
----- Improve card graphics
----- New mission to plant an enemy RAT
data.short_description: This is a 2D Deck Building, Turn-Based, Card Strategy, Gangster Management experience. Use your cards to help in battle or in the open city. This game comes with 1 loopable city to take over in which the enemy becomes harder to defeat after every win!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7 or greater
  • Processor: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Os X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: 64 bit Intel CPU
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
